title: ICT & Robotic Science Instructor (Secondary School) Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: ICT & Robotic Science Instructor (Secondary School)
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking enthusiastic and knowledgeable ICT and Robotic Science Instructors to teach students, particularly teenagers, in the areas of robotics, coding, and computer science.
	The ideal candidate will be passionate about STEM education and capable of translating complex technical concepts into engaging, hands-on learning experiences.


Key Responsibilities


	Deliver engaging instruction in robotics and ICT, both theoretically and practically.
	Teach programming using Python, C++, Java, or similar languages.
	Guide students in designing, building, and programming robots using platforms like Arduino, Raspberry Pi, LEGO Mindstorms, or VEX.
	Incorporate real-world applications into lessons to enhance student understanding and motivation.
	Provide mentorship and support tailored to teenage learners.
	Plan, supervise, and assess individual and group robotics projects.
	Maintain a safe, organized, and tech-enabled classroom or lab environment.
	Collaborate with other educators and participate in curriculum development and enrichment programs.


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor’s degree or higher in Robotics, Computer Science, Engineering, Electronics, Mechatronics, or related field.
	Hands-on experience with robotic kits and tools.
	Proficiency in programming and control systems.
	Previous teaching or mentoring experience (especially with teens) is a plus.


Technical Skills:


	Proficient in programming languages: Python, C++, Java
	Familiar with robotics platforms: Arduino, Raspberry Pi, LEGO Mindstorms, VEX
	Understanding of sensors, automation, robotic design, and control systems


Soft Skills:


	Strong communication and presentation abilities
	Patience and the ability to connect with young learners
	Creative problem-solving skills
	Ability to manage classroom dynamics and ensure safety during practical sessions


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 Monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
